member.name: T:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler
member.summary: Represents an object that schedules units of work on a CoreDispatcher.
member.seealso: This scheduler type is typically used indirectly through the ObserveOnDispatcher method that uses the current Dispatcher.
This scheduler type is typically used indirectly through the SubscribeOnDispatcher method that uses the current Dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler.#ctor(Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher)
member.summary: Constructs a CoreDispatcherScheduler that schedules units of work on the given dispatcher.
member.param: Dispatcher to schedule work on.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler.#ctor(Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher,Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority)
member.summary: Constructs a CoreDispatcherScheduler that schedules units of work on the given dispatcher with the given priority.
member.param: Dispatcher to schedule work on.
Priority for scheduled units of work.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler.Schedule``1(``0,System.TimeSpan,System.Func{System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,``0,System.IDisposable})
member.summary: Schedules an action to be executed after dueTime on the dispatcher, using a DispatcherTimer object.
member.param: State passed to the action to be executed.
Action to be executed.
Relative time after which to execute the action.
member.returns: The disposable object used to cancel the scheduled action (best effort).

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler.Schedule``1(``0,System.Func{System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,``0,System.IDisposable})
member.summary: Schedules an action to be executed on the dispatcher.
member.param: State passed to the action to be executed.
Action to be executed.
member.returns: The disposable object used to cancel the scheduled action (best effort).

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler.Default
member.summary: Gets the scheduler that schedules work on the CoreDispatcher associated with the current Window.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler.Dispatcher
member.summary: Gets the dispatcher associated with the CoreDispatcherScheduler.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Concurrency.CoreDispatcherScheduler.Priority
member.summary: Gets the priority at which work is scheduled.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable
member.summary: Provides a set of extension methods for scheduling actions performed through observable sequences on UI dispatchers.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.ObserveOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher)
member.summary: Asynchronously notify observers using the dispatcher.
member.param: Source sequence.
Dispatcher whose associated message loop is used to to notify observers on.
member.returns: The source sequence whose observations happen on the message loop associated with the specified dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.ObserveOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher,Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority)
member.summary: Asynchronously notify observers using the dispatcher.
member.param: Source sequence.
Dispatcher whose associated message loop is used to to notify observers on.
Priority to schedule work items at.
member.returns: The source sequence whose observations happen on the message loop associated with the specified dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.SubscribeOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher)
member.summary: Asynchronously subscribes and unsubscribes observers using the dispatcher.
member.param: Source sequence.
Dispatcher whose associated message loop is used to to perform subscription and unsubscription actions on.
member.returns: The source sequence whose subscriptions and unsubscriptions happen on the message loop associated with the specified dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.SubscribeOn``1(System.IObservable{``0},Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher,Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority)
member.summary: Asynchronously subscribes and unsubscribes observers using the dispatcher.
member.param: Source sequence.
Dispatcher whose associated message loop is used to to perform subscription and unsubscription actions on.
Priority to schedule work items at.
member.returns: The source sequence whose subscriptions and unsubscriptions happen on the message loop associated with the specified dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.ObserveOnDispatcher``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Asynchronously notify observers using the dispatcher associated with the current window.
member.param: Source sequence.
member.returns: The source sequence whose observations happen on the current window's dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.ObserveOnDispatcher``1(System.IObservable{``0},Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority)
member.summary: Asynchronously notify observers using the dispatcher associated with the current window.
member.param: Source sequence.
Priority to schedule work items at.
member.returns: The source sequence whose observations happen on the current window's dispatcher.

member.summary: Asynchronously subscribes and unsubscribes observers on the dispatcher associated with the current window.
member.param: Source sequence.
member.returns: The source sequence whose subscriptions and unsubscriptions happen on the current window's dispatcher.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.DispatcherObservable.SubscribeOnDispatcher``1(System.IObservable{``0},Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcherPriority)
member.summary: Asynchronously subscribes and unsubscribes observers on the dispatcher associated with the current window.

Priority to schedule work items at.
